A tool for charities and social good organisations that helps guide through the process of writing stories about the people they work with

Get involved See the prototype

See the Writegood prototype in action

We want to show you what we think Writegood will be like. These videos of our paper prototype will give you a rough idea of our features, and how you will interact with Writegood to write your stories.

Please check them out, and send us your feedback using the form below.

Let us know!
